## WorkspaceSvg.isMovableVertically() method

Is this workspace movable vertically?  True if the workspace is movable vertically, false otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isMovableVertically(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
